data: In your voyage down the west coast of Africa, after passing the southern extremity of Morocco, you sail for days and nights together past the shores of a never-ending land of desolation.
west coast of Africa | southern extremity of Morocco
Loti, Pierre, 1850-1923; Lamplough, A. O. (Augustus O.), 1877-1930 [Illustrator]; Laurie, Marjorie [Translator]
